'''Radiant Spincrystal 123''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Garden of Jade]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on a pavilion inside [[Carp's Rest]].

Once redeemed, it appears under the name "Jade Court in Chenyu" in the [[Realm Music]] interface, instead of using the soundtrack's officially released title.
